contentBlocks.title: General Air Conditioning Requirements
paragraphs: Air conditioning systems must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Air conditioning systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Air conditioning systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Air conditioning systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Air conditioning systems must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Air conditioning systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Air conditioning systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Air conditioning systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Air conditioning systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Air conditioning systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Air conditioning systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Air conditioning systems must be installed by a qualified person.
